desc: Best custom 3D Printed electric power wheelchair joystick handle toppers, U-shaped, goal-post, t-handle style extension stock knob replacement / upgrade for Bodypoint, Therafin style handles. Ergonomic design for comfort, style, less fatigue by Quadriplegic Maker. Panther, Stingray, Aero. Many colors available!

layout.text: I will no longer be selling my joystick handles. This product still is needed in the world. Over the next few months I will be figuring out how best to get the handles to the people who need them. Check back for updates
